description: This file contains mock implementations of OvsDbSocket functions used for testing. It references external mock object and overrides functions like ovsdb_socket_connect, ovsdb_socket_write, etc., to simulate socket behavior during tests.

methods.name: int ovsdb_socket_connect()
methods.description: Mocked function that simulates connecting to an OVS database socket, logging invocation and returning mock result.

methods.name: ssize_t ovsdb_socket_write(int fd,const char * buffer,size_t len)
methods.description: Mocked function that simulates writing data to the socket, logging details and returning mock result.

methods.name: ssize_t ovsdb_socket_listen(int fd,char * buffer,size_t size,int timeout)
methods.description: Mocked function that simulates listening on the socket, logging details and returning mock result.

methods.name: int ovsdb_socket_disconnect(int fd)
methods.description: Mocked function that simulates disconnecting the socket, logging invocation and returning mock result.

ctags.name: ovsdb_socket_listen
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" ssize_t ovsdb_socket_listen(int fd, char *buffer, size_t size, int timeout)$/

ctags.name: ovsdb_socket_write
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" ssize_t ovsdb_socket_write(int fd, const char *buffer, size_t len)$/
